user_words.english: {user} has spoken {words} words ({avg} wpl) in {chan} since {start}

chan_words.english: I've read {words} words ({avg} wpl) in {chan} since {start}

no_data.english: I don't recall seeing {user} in here, are you sure they exist?

hours_active.english: Typically {name} is most active between {start_hour}:00 and {end_hour}:00

loudest_user.english: {user} has spoken the most lines in this channel
